availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Warren County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Parmelia J. Roberts Cole iN Warren County on May 16, 1853. Father of Stanford Cole, Zachariah Cole, Philip Cole, Robert Cole, and Martha Cole. Farmer in Warren County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District 2, p. 93.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994057, Warren County Marriages.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994057, Warren County Deaths.
